SECRET_KEY.description: The secret key for Django app.

MONGO_URL.description: Connection string for pymongo to connect to mongoDB.

MONGO_DB.description: The database name of MongoDB. Set this when single db is needed, e.g. using mLab MongoDB on Heroku.

MONGO_BACKUP_URL.description: The connection string of MongoDB instance backup target. This cannot be a single db database.

PRODUCTION.description: Flag indicates that if the app is in production.

DEBUG.description: Flag indicates that if the app should display debug message / in debug mode.

TEST.description: Flag indicates that if the app is testing.

LOGGER.description: Logger(s) configuration. See `note.md` for more details.

LOG_LEVEL.description: Logger(s) configuration, specifically log level. See `note.md` for more details.

DISCORD_START.description: Start the Discord bot when the app is ready. The bot will be started if the value is given regardless what value it is.

NO_FIELD_CHECK.description: Set any value to this variable if the app should not perform model field check.

GI_CLIENT_ID.description: Google Identity service client id. Format should be 000000000000-ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff.apps.googleusercontent.com.

EMAIL_ACCOUNT.description: Email address/account for sending error report.

EMAIL_PASSWORD.description: Email password for sending error report. Recommended using alternate password for app access.

HTTP_HOST.description: The domain of the app excluding protocol and the ending slash. For example, bot.raenonx.cc

SERVICE_SHORT_URL.description: The URL to test the availability of the short service web app. Including protocol. Excluding slash.

DDNS_PASSWORD.description: Password for ddns update. Details in https://www.namecheap.com/support/knowledgebase/article.aspx/29/11/how-do-i-use-a-browser-to-dynamically-update-the-hosts-ip.

DDNS_HOST.description: Host for ddns update. Details in https://www.namecheap.com/support/knowledgebase/article.aspx/29/11/how-do-i-use-a-browser-to-dynamically-update-the-hosts-ip.

DDNS_DOMAIN.description: Domain for ddns update. Details in https://www.namecheap.com/support/knowledgebase/article.aspx/29/11/how-do-i-use-a-browser-to-dynamically-update-the-hosts-ip.
